name: Mustafa Lanewala
about:
I'm Mustafa Lanewala, Founder & CEO of MxNoor Solutions, a 21-year-old AI & Full Stack Engineer with 3+ years of experience building scalable web applications, working on AI and automation, and designing microservices architecture. Proficient in frontend & backend development, UI/UX design, and product management.

Beyond tech, I'm calm and curious. I enjoy traveling, photography, cooking, and spending time with family. As a Dawoodi Bohra, I find balance through prayer and community. I love exploring new tech stacks and building creative side projects.

experience.title: Founder & CEO
bullets: Founded a tech solutions company focused on innovative AI and full-stack development, delivering tailored web and app solutions.
Led the development and delivery of 15+ client projects, including e-commerce platforms, websites, AI-powered applications, and custom web solutions.
Built and led a skilled team fostering innovation and collaboration, and established strategic partnerships.

experience.title: Product Engineer
bullets: Leading fullstack development of Beem Cards — a digital smart card platform for seamless professional networking.
Built scalable systems with Django REST Framework, PostgreSQL, Docker Compose, and modular APIs, and developed responsive frontends using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Axios.

experience.title: Product Engineer
bullets: Led product management for Artifacts, creating a centralized platform to enhance communication and improve operational efficiency.
Developed CRM-integrated invoices, ad templates, and documents, enabling one-click generation and reducing manual effort.
Led UI/UX design efforts, creating branding elements, custom layouts, and interactive features.

projects.title: Beem Cards
projects.description: Revolutionized networking with a digital card platform using Django REST, PostgreSQL, Docker, React, Next.js, TypeScript for scalable, seamless experiences.

projects.title: SkAttireHub
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce platform with Razorpay integration, product listings, inventory management and streamlined shopping experiences.

projects.title: MxNoor Solutions
projects.description: Launched a solutions company specializing in web design, e-commerce, apps, graphics, multimedia to empower modern businesses with tailored solutions.

projects.title: Guidance
projects.description: Developed website for Guidance Tamil Nadu with responsive design, and CMS integration to showcase opportunities and support investors.

projects.title: Howdy Chats
projects.description: Developed the landing website for Howdy Chats, a social app with WhatsApp and Instagram features, featuring responsive design and feature pages.

projects.title: Mubarak Collection
projects.description: Developed the e-commerce website for Mubarak Collection, a trusted Dawoodi Bohra Topis brand since 2011, blending tradition, craftsmanship, and innovation.

projects.title: Gujarat Food Products
projects.description: Developed the website for Gujarat Food Products, pioneers in high-quality Makai Poha, combining traditional wisdom with modern technology for authentic Gujarati taste.

projects.title: M-Tasks
projects.description: Engineered a task management platform with real-time updates, team collaboration, Firebase integration for notifications, and modern UI/UX for enhanced productivity.

projects.title: MsyncAI
projects.description: Pioneered website generator delivering HTML, CSS, JavaScript code with live previews, enabling rapid prototyping and downloadable files for developers.

projects.title: BlogsBox
projects.description: Created blogging platform empowering users to create and manage content effortlessly, focused on performance and user experience with modern web technologies.
